channel.title: Nazi Zombies Anybody?
channel.description:
Well I got a challenge from a competitor called "Sakisa" to create a 3D Nazi Zombie game. It will have to be just like Nazi Zombies for Call of Duty Black Ops for the Nintendo DS. I purchased the game to see what it was like and its actually pretty fun. There are four maps: House, Facility, Temple, and Overlook. NOTE that in ALL 3D games they all start off as 2D Top view. I know this means I have to drop my GMLScape project for now, but I wont delete it. We could probably turn this into YoYo games and COULD win up to $1,000 if its really good. I would start on the programming now, but I need the size of the 2D and 3D models before I can.
[u][b]What the goal is:[/b][/u] Playable for single or multiplayer up to 6 people. Have all maps completed. Realistic sounds/bgmusic. Everything working.
[u][b]Included in the project:[/b][/u] [b]Level Designer:[/b] Open
[b]Graphics/3D Models:[/b] SadJav(Must start 2D top view)
[b]Sound Effects:[/b] Open(Optional)
[b]Music Creator:[/b] Open(Optional) (Background music ingame as well as in the title menu.)
[b]Programmer:[/b] GML Programmer Open(Optional)
[b]Interface Design:[/b] Open(Including main menu, options menu, level selection, and ingame(for guns currently held ect...))
[u][b]Progress:[/b][/u] Music Sounds Main Menu Options Menu Map 1(House) Map 2(Facility) Map 3(Temple) Map 4(Overlook) Controls Cheats/Purposeful Glitches Purchasing Weapons From Walls Mystery Box Opening Doors For Points Perks(Nuke, Double Points, Reconstruction, Instakill, Firesale, Max Ammo) Weapons Knifing Scope Views Reloading Animations Repairing Barriers
SOURCE DOWNLOAD: http://up.ht/ik4n88 Executable: http://up.ht/gI7bUr
Just messing around with it and what I came up with so far: [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/screenshot103-2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/screenshot102-2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/screenshot101-1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/screenshot106.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/screenshot105.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/screenshot104.png[/img]

item.title: Nazi Zombies Anybody?
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

[quote=“GML Programmer, post:30, topic:387788”][quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=483585.msg3544047#msg3544047 date=1301077059]
Give me a picture and a face limit. I’ll model for you.
I’m also pretty good with photoshop.
[/quote]
I actually got a modeler over the weekend. Sorry man.[quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=483585.msg3544166#msg3544166 date=1301085422]
Do the helpers go half and half with the reward of this “competition”?
[/quote]
Yes the reward will be split. All you will have to do is create a YoYo games user then I will have to add you as one of the calibrators.[/quote]

Fire the modeller and hire JIMB!

Read full topic

item.title: Nazi Zombies Anybody?
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

Lol I know I have looked at all of these people who are saying stuff about how GM sucks and that its not a real programming language, but I would love to see one of them make a 3D Nazi Zombie game. Atleast I KNOW I can do it. I already have barriers, wave control, opening doors for points, purchasing weapons off of the walls, and more. Im currently working on the mystery box, dogs, and crawlers.

Read full topic

item.title: Nazi Zombies Anybody?
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

The reason I took this project is because its a competition. This one I am going to finish. I can do the programming I just need help with the 3D models really. I can do everything else. I can find music and sound effects via google. The level design really isnt that hard I just dont like doing it but because im basically just copying the leves in the Nazi Zombies for the DS I can do it.

Read full topic
